ygData.subject: Re: Educating the masses
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... small ... to ... so ... You don t use Clouding while traveling. A good use is in dungeons, while the casters are meditating and the party is
ygData.messageBody:
> As with Invis and Selo's, except for the a problem I seem to have. I am
the
> one that usually knows where we're going : ) Invis' range is soooo
small
> it's frustrating. Definately not a travel song. I just finally made it
to
> Erudin to buy the missing songs out of my songbook. I also bought ahead,
so
> I'm good until level 33 or so. : )

You don't use Clouding while traveling. A good use is in dungeons, while the
casters are meditating and the party is healing. It's a free invis for the
whole party. You will be lauded as the hero of the party everytime a train
and it's backwash passes the party untouched.
